body_html:
@i-shenl — I think probably the easiest way at this point to compile with mkl on macOS is to checkout master, then cherry-pick @gunan's commit gunan@ecd85c2

(I haven't tried it but it certainly sounds much easier than the whole mess I went through)

edit: and as gunan writes above, probably just bazel build --config=mkl tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package to build after that. (again, I haven't tried it)
